    • Method Detail

      • updateIngredientQuantities

        public void updateIngredientQuantities​(java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> menuItemIds)
        This function updates the ingredients quantity in the database. The function begins a transaction, selects the specified menu items, calculates the required quantity for each ingredient, and updates it from the original quantity accordingly.
        Parameters:
        menuItemIds - A list of integers storing the IDs of menu items.

      • initializeMenuItemsPanel

        public void initializeMenuItemsPanel()
        This function initializes the menu items panel. The function sets the menu item panel, adds a title (and button), next/previous arrows for scrolling, and buttons to create the arrows functionality.

      • initializeButtonsPanel

        public void initializeButtonsPanel()
        This function initializes the buttons panel for all of the menu item buttons in the employee view. The function calls makeCall() to obtain the list of menu items, and then traverses through this list, creating a button for each item in each iteration. The function also adds functionality to update the current order text area when a button is clicked (and menu item is added to order).

      • addEmployeePanels

        public void addEmployeePanels​(javax.swing.JPanel topLeftPanel,
                              javax.swing.JPanel topRightPanel,
                              javax.swing.JPanel bottomRightPanel)
